title: NFTs for Architecture & STEM
description: There is a growing market for NFTs as IP in Architecture and STEM. What is the best strategy for bringing this market to the Cardano system?
solution: Organize a collection of paradigmatic use-cases for 2D and 3D diagrams being displayed, bought, and sold. Create templates for developers.
experience: Architecture, science illustration, engineering, IP, Full Stack Developer, JD, PhD,
